events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but want to request a refund because the size is incorrect and does not fit me at all.
The customer's message mentions requesting a refund due to incorrect sizing, categorizing this under refund-related issues.
Assigning the case to the refunds department specialist to handle the return and refund process for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you need to return your jacket for a refund due to sizing issues.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket was worn or damaged so we can proceed with your refund request?
My order number is 87451239. The jacket is brand new, unopened, and I have not worn it yet.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using our prepaid shipping label, and we will issue a full refund once we receive it.
That sounds great! I appreciate the prepaid label and quick refund option. Please send me the return instructions.
I've sent you an email with the prepaid return label and instructions on how to send back your jacket. Refund will be processed within 5 business days after receipt.
Just checking in to confirm if you received the refund after returning your jacket. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for the smooth process and excellent support.
We are glad your refund was processed successfully. Closing the case now, and feel free to reach out anytime for assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback regarding your refund experience with our support team.
